title: Foundations of Urban Railway Demand Forecasting Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic statistical analysis and data visualization, and understanding of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Optimization of smartphone-based learning environments, emphasizing data analysis skills applicable to real-life contexts

learning_goals: Identify and explain at least three spatiotemporal factors influencing urban railway demand forecasting
Understand dynamic graph modeling approaches using tensor decomposition techniques and apply them to real-world data
Implement a parallel learning-based multi-feature extraction module (temporal/spatial/spatiotemporal) to improve predictive model performance by over 15%
Effectively visualize demand forecasting results using smartphone-based data visualization tools in an LMS environment

resources: Python-Based Open-Source Data Analysis Tools (TensorFlow, Keras)
Public Urban Railway Dataset (Boarding/Alighting Passengers, Time-Based Population Flow)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
